|brand = Synology |model = MR2200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ac |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = YOR-MR2200AC |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 1244-01001110-50Z |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NE7176WF, E071700; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6433FM2I-08G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = WPA3, Wave2, MU-MIMO, OWE, 802.11k/v/r, SRM 1.2, DFS (master) |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 6028Y;2; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch with Low-Noise Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;SKY1, 5201, 703V;2; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, 721JY, 1721 MY;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = RE-7674 |manuf_rev = STR V1.0A |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/15/2018 |estreldate = 10/11/2018 |estprice = 140 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833593005 |asin = B07HPSQZKN |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 876 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 876 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 300 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "1244-01001110-50Z ES" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
*{{WiFiCert|WFA77433|05/10/2018}} *{{WiFiCert|WFA77433|10/24/2018}} (WPA3 Support)
*[https://www.synology.com/ru-ru/releaseNote/RT2600ac ''Synology RT2600ac'' Release Notes - v1.2-7742] (2018-10-16) :Added support for WPA3 Personal/Enterprise :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac. :Added support for Wi-Fi Enhanced Open (OWE) :security encryption on RT2600ac and MR2200ac.
{{See also|Synology RT2600ac|Synology RT1900ac}}
===Specifications=== *[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @716MHz Quad-Core ARM CPU *Tri-band Wi-Fi: single SSID with 802.11k/v/r *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE, 1x USB 3.0 *Arrives with Synology Router Manager 1.2 *Dedicated Mobile App
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13109/synology-2018-nas-and-wifi-lineup-sneak-peek ''Synology 2018 NAS and Wi-Fi Lineup Sneak Peek'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.pcworld.idg.com.au/article/641958/computex-2018-synology-debut-first-mesh-router/ ''Computex 2018: Synology debut first mesh router'' on '''PCWorld'''] *[https://nascompares.com/2018/06/14/synology-mr2200ac-mesh-router-your-questions-answered/ ''Synology MR2200ac Mesh Router'' on '''NASCompares'''] *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/1977-synology-mesh-router-ac2200-tri-band/ ''Synology MR2200ac Mesh Router'' on '''OpenITforum''']
===Reviews=== *[https://www.digitalcitizen.life/synology-mr2200ac-mesh-router-review ''Synology MR2200ac review'' on '''Digital Citizen''']
